abort.autonext: Stay on this screen for a while
beidconnect.linux.step.1: Please install the BeIDConnect package to use this signing application. After installation, the signature application can securely connect to your card reader and eID.{newLine}{newLine}By installing and using BeIDConnect, you agree to the software license.{newLine} {licenseLink} {newLine}{newLine} Install the 'beidconnect-archive' package so the 'beidconnect' package repository becomes available.
beidconnect.linux.step.2: Install the 'beidconnect' package in the usual way for your distribution. This may require you to first perform an update of the indexes (e.g. using 'apt-get update').
beidconnect.linux.supported.title: Supported distributions and versions
certificate.choose.name: name : {commonName}
certificate.choose.text.1: Multiple valid certificates were found. Please select the certificate you want to use.
certificate.choose.title: Select a certificate
certificate.validate.title: Validating certificates
digestLoading.title: Signing document
eid.install.text.2: Please install BeIDConnect to use this signing application. After installation, the signature application can securely connect to your card reader and eID.
eid.install.title: Install BeIDConnect
eid.link.error.card.blocked: PIN is incorrect: no attempts left. The eID card is blocked.
eid.link.error.card.not_found.title: No eID card found
eid.link.error.general.text: Something went wrong. Please reload the page and try again.
eid.link.error.general.title: Something went wrong
eid.link.error.reader.not_found.title: No eID reader found
eid.link.error.reader.not_supported.text: This application doesn't support this eID reader type.
eid.link.error.reader.not_supported.titl: This eID reader is not supported
eid.update.text.1: The installed version of BeIDConnect is not up to date.
eid.update.text.2: Please install the latest version of BeIDConnect to use this singing application.
eid.update.title: Update BeIDConnect
error.FAILED_TO_FETCH_DATA_TO_SIGN: Failed to fetch data to sign.
error.METADATA_FETCH: Failed to fetch the metadata of the document.
error.NO_DOC_TO_VALIDATE: A technical error happened, the document is not present.
error.NOT_ALLOWED_TO_SIGN: You do not have permission to sign this specific document. Please contact the owner of the document for more information.
error.SIGN_PERIOD_EXPIRED: Entering the PIN took too long.
error.browser_not_supported.text: Your browser is not supported. Please use one of the following browsers:
error.browser_not_supported.title: Browser is not supported
error.certificates.not_found.text: There are no (valid) signing certificates found.
error.certificates.not_found.title: No valid certificates found
error.general.text: Something went wrong. Please reload the page and try again.
error.general.title: Something went wrong
extension.install.text.2: Please install the BeIDConnect extension to use this signing application. Each browser type needs an extension to be able to use the function of BeIDConnect optimally. You can find the extension in the web store below.
extension.install.text.3: After you installed this extension, you can confirm this on this page by clicking on {extensionInstallNext}.
extension.install.title: Install BeIDConnect extension
file.download.text.1: The document to sign can't be previewed but you can download it by right-clicking on the link below and selecting the option 'save-link-as'.
index.title: Signing Box
index.welcome: The online signature service 'Signing box' is offered by the Federal Government.
index.content: With this service you can digitally sign your documents (pdf or xml) or check the validity of a signed document (pdf or xml). With 'Signing box' you are sure that your document is signed correctly!
index.footer: If you want more information about eID cards and card readers, you can find it here:
index.footer2a: If you experience problems with the signing or the installation of software, you can find more information here:
metadataLoading.title: Loading and checking document
pin_length: PIN doesn't have the correct length.
pin_timeout: Entering the PIN took too long.
pinpad.error.title: PIN entry error
retrieve.certificates.title: Retrieving certificates
signing.loading.title: Digitally Sign Document
signing.pininput.text: Enter the PIN and click on {signingButton} to sign the document.
signing.pininput.title: Enter PIN code
signing.presign.text: Please enter the PIN for {certificateName} when prompted and click OK to sign the document.
signing.presign.title: Sign document
signing.upload.title: Sign document
signing.upload.text.step.1: Select a document (pdf or xml) via the button {selectDocumentButton}.
signing.upload.text.step.3: Insert your eID card in the card reader.
signing.upload.text.step.4: Click on the button {signButton} and enter your pincode when asked.
succes.autodownload: Your document will be automatically downloaded. If this is not the case, you can start the download manually.
succes.documentNotAutoDownloaded: You can download the document by clicking on {succesButtonDownload}.
succes.title: Your document has been successfully signed!
title: BOSA - Signing Document
token.intro.nodownload: Please note: you will not be able to download the signed document(s) after signing.
token.intro.reject: Don't want to sign this document?{newLine}Click {rejectButtonText} to reject signing the document.
token.intro.title: Digital signature of {fileName}
token.intro.txt: Welcome {newLine} you are about to sign the document on the left. {newLine} {newLine} When you have read the document, connect your eID reader to your computer, insert the eID card and click {signButtonText} to digitally sign it. {newLine} {newLine} You will sign the document with the PIN of your eID, please make sure that you know this PIN.
validate.certificate.info: The certificate is being validated, this operation can take some time.
validate.loading.title: Validate document
validate.result.messages.chainConstraint: The signing certificate chain (certificate on eID) used to sign this document does not meet the validation constraints.
validate.result.messages.chainGeneralFai: One or more of the signing certificates (certificate on eID) found in the certificate chain used to sign this document produce an unspecified error.
validate.result.messages.cryptoConstrain: The signature algorithm or the keys used in the algoritm are below the required cryptographic security level.
The signature algorithm or the keys used in the algoritm appear to be below the required cryptographic security level.
validate.result.messages.dataNotFound: No signature information can be retrieved.
validate.result.messages.expired: The signature seems to be created after the expiration date of the used signing certificate (certificate on eID).
validate.result.messages.formatFailure: The signature in this document doesn't have the right format. The validation tool was unable to process the signature.
validate.result.messages.generic: An error occurred during validation. Please reload the page and try again.
validate.result.messages.hashFailure: At least one hash of the signed document (algorithm) does not match the corresponding hash value (algorithm) in the signature.
validate.result.messages.indeterminate: There was insufficient information to determine if the digital signature is valid.
validate.result.messages.noChainFound: The signing certificate (certificate on eID) used to sign this document cannot be found.
validate.result.messages.noPOE: The necessary proof of existence, needed for validation, is missing. Please reload the page and try again. Contact servicedesk.DTO@bosa.fgov.be if this error continues to appear. Please include the error message 'proof of existence' in your report.
validate.result.messages.noSigningCertif: The signing certificate (certificate on eID) used to sign this document cannot be identified.
validate.result.messages.notYetValid: The time of signature of the document is before the date of issue of the used signing certificate (certificate on eID).
validate.result.messages.outOfBoundsNoPO: The signing certificate (certificate on eID) used to sign this document has expired or is not yet valid.
validate.result.messages.passed: The signature in the document passed the validation.
validate.result.messages.policyProcessin: The formal file with details about the used signature policy cannot be processed during the validation process.
validate.result.messages.rekoved: The signing certificate (certificate on eID) used to sign this document was already revoked when signing the document.
validate.result.messages.rekovedCANoPOE: One of the signing certificates (intermediate CA certificate), found in the certificate chain used to sign this document has been revoked.
validate.result.messages.rekovedNoPOE: The signing certificate (certificate on eID) used to sign this document has been revoked.
validate.result.messages.signatureConstr: The signature does not match the validation constraints.
validate.result.messages.signatureCrypto: A valid signature uses a private key (e.g. eID PIN code) and a public key (provided by the signing software). It appears to be impossible to verify the public key used to sign this document. Therefore signature cannot be verified.
validate.result.messages.signaturePolicy: The electronic file with details about the signature policy is not available for the validation process.
validate.result.messages.timestampOrderF: When signing a document one or more time stamps are added to register the official time and/or form of the signature. In this document the constraint on the order of the time stamps does not appear to be respected.
validate.result.messages.tryLater: Not enough signature information is available to check all constraints.
validate.result.title: Result of the validation
validate.upload.text.step.1: Select the digitally signed document (pdf or xml) by clicking on the button {selectDocumentButton}.
validate.upload.text.step.2: Click on the button {validateButton} to start the validation.
validate.upload.title: Validate digitally signed document
xmlpreview.error: Couldn't create the preview of the document to sign.
xmlpreview.loading: Loading the preview of the document...
